query: Please write a blog post about the new Google Gemini 2.5 Flash Preview model, also known as Nanobanana.
reference: Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash is a powerful, lightweight, and cost-effective model, designed for speed and efficiency. It's a multimodal model that can process text, audio, images, and video, and it features a 1-million token context window. With its 'thinking' capability, users can see the reasoning process behind the model's responses, providing greater transparency.

results.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash is now available in public preview
results.snippet: Gemini 2.5 Flash is the latest addition to the Gemini family, optimized for speed and efficiency. It's a multimodal model with a 1-million token context window and new 'thinking' capabilities.

results.title: Google launches Gemini 2.5 Flash, a new AI model that’s faster and cheaper to run
results.snippet: Google today announced Gemini 2.5 Flash, a new AI model that’s designed to be faster and cheaper to run for developers and enterprise customers.
